Description: Upper section of a blue glazed composition shabti with black painted detail: a lotus-headdress worn over a curled lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced features, a collar, a garment with pleated elbow-length sleeves and crossed arms in relief with bracelets holding two whips; the leg section has broken away.
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
